snippet: A mayoral race in a southern Russian city is widely acknowledged to have been marred by fraud, but residents react mostly with cynical shrugs.
abstract: Moscow opposition leaders travel to Astrakhan, Russia, to show their support for Oleg V Shein, opposition politician who waged a four-week hunger strike to protest alleged ballot fraud in Astrakhan's mayoral election; many locals believe that Shein won the race, but have no interest in attending rallies or protests.
lead_paragraph: A mayoral race in a southern Russian city is widely acknowledged to have been marred by fraud, but residents react mostly with cynical shrugs.

headline.seo: Moscow Activists Find Apathy in Astrakhan
headline.main: Opposition Finds Apathy Over Election in Russia City
headline.print_headline: Opposition Finds Apathy Over Election In Russia City
